Articles.Content: Rest in peace, Pirs, the Russian ''docking compartment'' will soon be removed from the ISS on July 23 2021 12:45 UTC to make room for the new Russian Nauka laboratory module that launched on July 21 2021 at 14:58 GMT
I honestly hope it will, Nauka is having a lot of problems right now with parts that, afaik, are necessary for a successful docking
